methods.sendSystemErrToLogger:
Redirect System.err to the specified logger, at level STDERR.

:param logger: (io.deephaven.io.logger.Logger) - the receiving logger
methods.sendSystemOutToLogger:
Redirect System.out to the specified logger, at level STDOUT.

:param logger: (io.deephaven.io.logger.Logger) - the receiving logger

text: Class to allow logs to receive sysout and syserr output.
